* BrightBlade had turned her back as she had seen Tavatron's charge coming 
towards her and Gangon, she had taken it for her partner and was now on her 
knees.
She faced Gangon, a hole on her back now flowing with mech fluid.
BrightBlade slowly looked up at Gangon and a small smile began to form on 
her lips...*

" What are...friends for....right?"

* She was weakening and loosing mech fluid fast, a flash of green caught her 
optic and she slowly looked over. Right beside her was that energy that she 
meant to give Gangon, she picked it up and held it to his lips.*

" Here,...drink this. It should give you enough energy to...get back to base 
and...repair."

* Despite her damage she held the round container steadily up to her 
partner's lips, he needed it more then she did right now.*
